info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Chesterfield, west central Charles City, northwestern Prince George and southeastern Henrico Counties, the City of Colonial Heights, the City of Hopewell and the eastern City of Petersburg through 300 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hopewell, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Colonial Heights around 235 PM EDT. Hopewell around 240 PM EDT. Fort Gregg-Adams and Virginia State University around 245 PM EDT. Petersburg and Jordans Point around 300 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Jordan Point Country Club, Meadowville, Birchett Estate and Petersburg National Battlefield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
